sentences.sContent: He tends to overestimate his own abilities.
sentences.sCn: 他往往高估自己的能力。

sentences.sContent: The importance of training in health and safety cannot be overestimated (= is extremely important ).
sentences.sCn: 对健康和安全方面的培训极为重要。

remMethod.val: over(在…上) + estimate(评估) → 评价过高

trans.tranOther: to think something is better, more important etc than it really is
